cpou_rclone_modal_explanation: Please download a configuration file to access Rclone.
cpou_rclone_modal_input_region_label: Select the region for this file:
cpou_rclone_modal_security_note: For security reasons, the configuration file doesn't include your password. You must add your password manually by editing the configuration file.
cpou_rclone_modal_loading_error: An error has occurred loading the data linked to the Rclone file: {{ message }}
